snippet: Barely a month removed from gallbladder surgery, Wade Phillips will be on hand this weekend to make the defensive calls in Houston’s first playoff game.
abstract: Houston Texans defensive coordinator Wade Phillips, who is recovering from gallbladder surgery, will be on hand to make defensive calls for team's first playoff appearance; under Phillips, Houston's defense ranks second over all this season, up from 30th in 2010.
lead_paragraph: Barely a month removed from gallbladder surgery, Wade Phillips will be on hand this weekend to make the defensive calls in Houston’s first playoff game.

headline.seo: On Cue From Phillips, Texans’ Defense Turns Tough and Steady
headline.main: Like Phillips, Texans’ Defense Steadies and Toughens
headline.print_headline: Like Phillips, Texans’ Defense Steadies and Toughens
